sentences.en: Nowadays banks in the UK do not return your cheque with each statement, so it is advisable to keep a record of transactions on the counterfoil or stub.
sentences.cn: 目前，英国银行在发送对账单时不附支票，因此，保存好每笔交易记录的支票存根或票根是明智的。 。

trans.tran_en: the part of something such as a cheque that you keep as a record
